scripts.invoke:calculator: PRICING_TAG_KEY=name PRICING_TAG_VALUE=sermo serverless invoke local --function calculator --path tags.json --region=$AWS_REGION
scripts.invoke:inhibitor: PRICING_TAG_KEY=name PRICING_TAG_VALUE=sermo serverless invoke local --function inhibitor --path tags.json --region=$AWS_REGION
scripts.build: rm -rf lib && mkdir lib && npm i && tsc
scripts.package: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp -r lib package.json package-lock.json build && cd build && npm i --production && zip -qr functions.zip node_modules lib
